text: us svarg kee visheshata, jisaka vachan diya gaya hai aagyaakaariyon ko, usamen naharen hain nirmal jal kee tatha naharen hain doodh kee, nahin badalega jisaka svaad tatha naharen hain madira kee, peene vaalon ke svaad ke lie tatha naharen hain madhoo kee svachchh tatha unheen ke lie unamen pratyek prakaar ke phal hain tatha unake paalanahaar kee or se kshama. (kya ye) usake samaan honge, jo sadaavaasee honge narak mein tatha pilaaye jaayeng khaulata jal, jo khand-khand kar dega unakee aanton ko
